00003 //*****************************************************************************
00004 //
00005 // File Name    : 'ks0108conf.h'
00006 // Title                : Graphic LCD driver for HD61202/KS0108 displays
00007 // Author               : Pascal Stang - Copyright (C) 2001-2003 - Modified by Mikael Larsmark
00008 // Date                 : 10/19/2001
00009 // Revised              : 2007-11-24
00010 // Version              : 0.5
00011 // Target MCU   : Atmel AVR
00012 // Editor Tabs  : 4
00013 //
00014 // NOTE: This code is currently below version 1.0, and therefore is considered
00015 // to be lacking in some functionality or documentation, or may not be fully
00016 // tested.  Nonetheless, you can expect most functions to work.
00017 //
00018 // This code is distributed under the GNU Public License
00019 //              which can be found at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt
00020 //
00021 //*****************************************************************************
00022 
00023 
00024 #ifndef KS0108CONF_H
00025 #define KS0108CONF_H
00026 
00027 // define LCD hardware interface
00028 // -LCD_MEMORY_INTERFACE assumes that the registers of the LCD have been mapped
00029 // into the external memory space of the AVR processor memory bus
00030 // -LCD_PORT_INTERFACE is a direct-connection interface from port pins to LCD
00031 // SELECT (UNCOMMENT) ONLY ONE!
00032 
00033 // *** NOTE: memory interface is not yet fully supported, but it might work
00034 
00035 //#define GLCD_MEMORY_INTERFACE
00036 #define GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00037 
00038 // GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE specifics
00039 #ifdef GLCD_PORT_INTERFACE
00040         // make sure these parameters are not already defined elsewhere
00041         #ifndef GLCD_CTRL_PORT
00042                 #define GLCD_CTRL_PORT  PORTK   // PORT for LCD control signals
00043                 #define GLCD_CTRL_DDR           DDRK    // DDR register of LCD_CTRL_PORT
00044                 #define GLCD_CTRL_RS            PK4             // pin for LCD Register Select
00045                 #define GLCD_CTRL_RW            PK3             // pin for LCD Read/Write
00046                 #define GLCD_CTRL_E                     PK5             // pin for LCD Enable
00047                 #define GLCD_CTRL_CS0           PK1             // pin for LCD Controller 0 Chip Select
00048                 #define GLCD_CTRL_CS1           PK0             // pin for LCD Controller 1 Chip Select(*)
00049                 #define GLCD_CTRL_CS2           PA1             // pin for LCD Controller 2 Chip Select(*)
00050                 #define GLCD_CTRL_CS3           PA0             // pin for LCD Controller 3 Chip Select(*)
00051                 #define GLCD_CTRL_RESET PK2             // pin for LCD Reset
00052                 // (*) NOTE: additonal controller chip selects are optional and 
00053                 // will be automatically used per each step in 64 pixels of display size
00054                 // Example: Display with 128 hozizontal pixels uses 2 controllers
00055         #endif
00056         #ifndef GLCD_DATA_PORT
00057                 #define GLCD_DATA_PORT  PORTF   // PORT for LCD data signals
00058                 #define GLCD_DATA_DDR           DDRF    // DDR register of LCD_DATA_PORT
00059                 #define GLCD_DATA_PIN           PINF    // PIN register of LCD_DATA_PORT
00060         #endif
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 // GLCD_MEMORY_INTERFACE specifics
00064 #ifdef GLCD_MEMORY_INTERFACE
00065         // make sure these parameters are not already defined elsewhere
00066         #ifndef GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR
00067                 // absolute address of LCD Controller #0 CTRL and DATA registers
00068                 #define GLCD_CONTROLLER0_CTRL_ADDR      0x1000
00069                 #define GLCD_CONTROLLER0_DATA_ADDR      0x1001
00070                 // offset of other controllers with respect to controller0
00071                 #define GLCD_CONTROLLER_ADDR_OFFSET     0x0002
00072         #endif
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 
00076 // LCD geometry defines (change these definitions to adapt code/settings)
00077 #define GLCD_XPIXELS                    128             // pixel width of entire display
00078 #define GLCD_YPIXELS                    64              // pixel height of entire display
00079 #define GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS 64              // pixel width of one display controller
00080 
00081 // Set text size of display
00082 // These definitions are not currently used and will probably move to glcd.h
00083 #define GLCD_TEXT_LINES           8     // visible lines
00084 #define GLCD_TEXT_LINE_LENGTH    22     // internal line length
00085 
00086 #endif
